channel.title: Homepage on David Hao Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on David Hao Zhang

item.description: I am a PhD Candidate from Harvard’s Department of Economics and Harvard Business School. My current research focuses on inequality and inefficiency in housing finance. I am particularly interested in issues surrounding racial equity and social welfare in mortgage markets. My fields of specialization are Finance, Real Estate, Industrial Organization, and Econometrics.
* Asterisks indicate presentation by a co-author. Website: This website was built using Hugo based on code from Gautam Rao.
